message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe is worth a lot to you. I'm willing to let it go for $14,000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $11,000 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to be closer to my original offer. How about $13,000?  I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $12,000?
